title: Why AI is the Best Tool for Failed Payment Recovery
summary: This page explains why Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the most effective tool for recovering revenue from failed payments. It highlights how specialized AI-powered solutions outperform in-house or rules-based systems in reducing involuntary churn and maximizing customer lifetime value.
key_points: AI is superior to in-house or rules-based systems for failed payment recovery.
Top-performing companies outsource failed payment recovery to specialized third-party solutions.
Focusing on revenue optimization through specialized recovery is more important than minimizing recovery costs.
AI leverages computer science and datasets to analyze data and make decisions for complex problem-solving.
